title: How to Make Traditional Guacamole

steps.headline: Cut the avocados into halves and scoop out all the beautiful ripe avocado meat.
Add all the ingredients but the lime juice.
steps.description: Make sure to add enough sea salt in order to bring out the guacamole flavors.

steps.headline: Mash the avocado and the other ingredients into a chunky mixture with a potato masher or two spoons.
steps.description: This secret allows you to leave the avocado and other ingredients in larger pieces and avoids the mushy slurry that blenders and forks give.

steps.headline: Garnish with a little piece of cilantro.
Serve with any kind of bread, chips or on tostadas.

text: Cut the avocados into halves and scoop out all the beautiful ripe avocado meat.  Add all the ingredients but the lime juice. Make sure to add enough sea salt in order to bring out the guacamole flavors. Add the lime.  Mash the avocado and the other ingredients into a chunky mixture with a potato masher or two spoons. This secret allows you to leave the avocado and other ingredients in larger pieces and avoids the mushy slurry that blenders and forks give. Garnish with a little piece of cilantro.  Serve with any kind of bread, chips or on tostadas. Enjoy! Finished.
